name: css-width-percentages
description: Css module of single purpose classes for width percentages

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-width-percentages.css > css/css-width-percentages.css && tachyons src/css-width-percentages.css --minify > css/css-width-percentages.min.css && tachyons src/css-width-percentages.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
